selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute the age gap by subtracting the ages of Alice and Bob.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use calc_numeric to evaluate the expression '30 - 25' to find the age gap.

new_skill_specs.name: extract_text_from_image
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract text from an image to obtain the ages of Alice and Bob.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A dictionary with keys 'Alice' and 'Bob' containing their respective ages as integers.
edge_cases: Image contains noise or unclear text
Text is not in expected format
